reuters.title: FEDERATED DEPARTMENT STORES MARCH SALES UP 4.9 PCT
reuters.body: Yugoslavia will tender April 14 for 100,000 tonnes of wheat, the U.S. Agriculture Department's Counselor in Belgrade said in a field report. The report, dated April 7, said the wheat must be from 1986 and 1987 harvest, and imports of soft wheat from Europe and from other suppliers will not be considered. It said the imports will be used to rebuild the federal reserves and as a result will not be subject to import surcharges. Reuter 
